snippet.title: Amber Heard wants Harry Potter Role After Johnny Depp Is Gone
snippet.description:
Amber Heard wants Harry Potter Role After Johnny Depp Is Gone!

Hollywood superstar Johnny Depp has exited the Fantastic Beasts film franchise, days after losing a libel case over a newspaper article which called him 'a wife beater'. In a letter to fans, shared on his official social media accounts, Depp said he had been "asked to resign" from his role as the villainous Gellert Grindelwald and had "respected that and agreed to that request".


Johnny Depp played the role of Gellert Grindewald in Fantastic Beast 1 and 2. Due to his case where he was tended to be responsible by law then Warner Bros dropped him from the Fantastic Beasts franchise. Fans of Johnny Depp are campaigning to rehire him but it seems like that this would not affect the decision of Warner Bros. And now it is being reported that Warner Bro’s casting Amber Heard in Harry Potter Universe.


All about Amber Heard and Johnny Depp: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ocYczSAnwe4&list=PL-LyakzH3f2lqAYSUPCvC1b8oXVhqyTPG
